nodes.text: The Army infantry corps was the infantry corps of the Separatist Droid Army. Separatist infantry forces were mainly made up of their battle droids, particularly the B1-series battle droids. However, while the B1 was the bulk of the infantry corps and the Separatists's main soldier, other combat droids, such as the B2-series super battle droid and BX-series droid commando, were deployed.
